content: 99.co Event CPF Property Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 24 May 2019Is there any way to increase my CPF amount so that I can buy more than one property?I want to use more of my CPF amount to buy property rather than taking a large loan, is there any way to do so?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Douglas Chow, Chief Enlightenment Officer at Empower AdvisoryLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 26 May 2019Hi, Douglas here. 2nd Keynote Speaker.I'm afraid not. You just have to pump more in through a higher paying job assuming you haven't hit the ceiling cap of CPF contribution.​​​
You can always connect with me via https://www.facebook.com/douglas.chow.908 or simply whatsapp/sms my company 24/7 hotline @83324283
Remember, plan your finances properly, don’t overstretch, do your homework and enjoy your property investment journey.
Regards
